Oh, right, I promised you a reward. I was cleaning out
my closet last week and found these from my younger
days. I don't need them anymore, but maybe you could
give them to your friends as gifts.\n<Odis>
I know you're not the type to usually give gifts to
people. Do you need me to give you some tips?\n<Odis>
Gift items, such as the ones I gave you, can only be
given to people in your party. Amber is in your party
now, so you can give her the gift right away.\n<Odis>
Kaleb, however, wasn't chosen to go with you, so it
might be a while until you can give him his.\n<Odis>
To give the gift itself, you simply use it like any
other. The gift will only be usable on those who would
Anyway, best luck on your travels. Try to get them
